text:
e="preserve">Dimitri Diatchenko (April 11, 1968 – April 21, 2020) was an American actor and musician. He was born in San Francisco, California. He was known for playing Russian villain roles. His best known roles were as Russian henchmen in "Get Smart" and "Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull". He also played Yuri in "Chernobyl Diaries".
Diatchenko was found dead in his home in Coral Gables, Florida on April 21, 2020 of a heart attack, aged 52.

annotations.surface_form: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
